website.title: Qwertycoin 지갑 | 간단하고 안전하며 안전합니다. 미래에 오신 것을 환영합니다.
website.description: Qwertycoin 통화를위한 공식 온라인 지갑 - 최적의 보안을 위해 브라우저에서 완벽하게 처리됩니다.

global.disableSecurity: 보안을 해제하며, 사용자는 그에 따른 위험을 인지합니다
global.passwordInvalidRequirements: 비밀번호는 최소 8자리 이상이여야 하며, 1개 이상의 대문자, 소문자, 숫자 및 특수 문자로 구성해 주세요

permissionRequiredForCameraModal.title: 카메라
permissionRequiredForCameraModal.content: QR code 스캔을 위한 카메라의 접근 권한이 필요합니다

backupBlock.title: 비공개 키와 연상기호를 저장하여, 지갑을 복구할 수 있습니다
backupBlock.warningMessage:
**절대로 잃어버리면 안됩니다!** 잃어버릴 경우 찾을 수 없습니다
**타인에게 공유하면 안됩니다!** 타인이 해당 정보를 이용하여 쿼티코인을 빼갈 수 있습니다. 비슷한 주소의 피싱 사이트를 조심하셔야 합니다.
**백업을 만드세요!** 언젠가는 큰 금액이 될지도 모르니까요.

disclaimerBlock.title: Risk of Using QwertycoinWallet
disclaimerBlock.content:
QwertycoinWallet is a web-based interface. It helps you use Qwertycoin without running a full Qwertycoin node.
We recommend you treat QwertycoinWallet like you will treat your actual wallet.

donatePage.title: Donate
donatePage.subtitle: Help to fund the development and pay the bills

webwalletBlock.title: Webwallet
webwalletBlock.content: If you want to help to pay for the servers, to support new features development, and like this app, please consider a donation:

devFundBlock.title: Qwertycoin Dev fund
devFundBlock.content: To help Qwertycoin, you can donate at these addresses

getInTouchBlock.title: Let's Get In Touch!
getInTouchBlock.content: Do you have ideas or feedback that could help us improve the wallet? Contact us!

address.label: Destination address
address.placeholder: Write the address where you want to send funds
address.fundsTo: The funds will be sent to

paymentId.label: Payment ID (optional)
paymentId.invalid: The payment ID is invalid. The length must be 16 or 64 characters

notEnoughMoneyModal.title: Oops...
notEnoughMoneyModal.content: You don't have enough funds in your wallet to execute this transfer

thankYouDonationModal.title: Thank you for your donation!
thankYouDonationModal.content: Your help is appreciated. This donation will help make Qwertycoin better

transferExceptionModal.title: Oops...
transferExceptionModal.content: An error occurred. Please report this error: {details}

waitingNfcModal.title: Waiting Nfc
waitingNfcModal.content: Bring closer to the other device

address.title: Your address to receive funds:
address.label: Give this address to receive funds

waitingNfcToWriteModal.title: Waiting Nfc
waitingNfcToWriteModal.content: Bring closer the NFC tag to write

miningPage.title: Mine directly in your browser
miningPage.subtitle: Support the network by mining and be rewarded with QWC

statisticsBlocks.title: Statistics
statisticsBlocks.dedicatedHardware: With dedicating mining software and hardware, you could earn more and help decentralize the network.
statisticsBlocks.miningHandledBy: This mining is handled by the mining pool pool.qwertycoin.org

speed.label: Speed to update the wallet (will consume more resources)

readMinerTx.label: Read miner transactions (only for solo mining)

deleteWalletModal.title: Delete My Wallet (local copy)
deleteWalletModal.content: Are you sure you REALLY want to delete your wallet ?

passwordConfirm.label: Confirm the password
passwordConfirm.invalid: The password does not match the first password you wrote

importFromQrPage.title: Importing wallet from a QR code
importFromQrPage.subtitle: Import a wallet from an offline backup

warningBlock.title: Warning
warningBlock.content:
If you choose to save your private keys or your mnemonic phrase, PLEASE DO NOT store them in clear-text for your own safety.
The file is an alternate solution where your keys are encrypted and contains a backup of all your transactions to spare you a future synchronisation.

walletKeysModal.title: Private keys
walletKeysModal.content:
Please carefully store these keys. Possessing them means possessing the funds associated !
Spend key: {privSpendKey}
Private view key: {privViewKey}

mnemonicKeyModal.title: Mnemonic phrase
mnemonicKeyModal.content:
Please store carefully this mnemonic phrase. Possessing it means possessing the funds associated ! The phrase is:
{mnemonic}

mnemonicLangSelectionModal.title: In which language do you want your mnemonic phrase?

importPage.title: Create a wallet
importPage.subtitle: From previously created keys, file, or mnemonic phrase

importFromFilePage.title: Importing wallet from a backup file
importFromFilePage.subtitle: Use your backup file to create a wallet

importFromMnemonicPage.title: Importing wallet from a mnemonic phrase
importFromMnemonicPage.subtitle: Use your phrase to create a wallet

importFromKeysPage.title: Importing wallet from keys
importFromKeysPage.subtitle: Use your keys to create a wallet
